CustomField.formula: TEXT ( YEAR( CollateralLoanStartDate__c) ) +"-"+ IF(MONTH(CollateralLoanStartDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MONTH(CollateralLoanStartDate__c)), TEXT(MONTH(CollateralLoanStartDate__c)) ) +"-"+ IF(DAY(CollateralLoanStartDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(DAY(CollateralLoanStartDate__c)), TEXT(DAY(CollateralLoanStartDate__c)) ) + " ~ " + TEXT ( YEAR( CollateralLoanEndDate__c) )+"-" + IF(MONTH(CollateralLoanEndDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MONTH(CollateralLoanEndDate__c)), TEXT(MONTH(CollateralLoanEndDate__c)) ) +"-"+ IF(DAY(CollateralLoanEndDate__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT(DAY(CollateralLoanEndDate__c)), TEXT(DAY(CollateralLoanEndDate__c)) )
CustomField.label: Collateral Loan Period
